name: Hib & Hob
description:
I have designed a fun game for two that you can play with your friends or your lover.

I have designed 3 chapters now, but if the game attracts attention, you can be sure that I will increase the number of chapters. 

I would be very happy if you download the game and comment. Fun games :)

How to play?

Player 1 - WASD

Player 2 - Arrow Keys
